channel.title: How to make tele 317
channel.description: how do i make it so when i click on stairs it teleports me to second level or first level.... i no the cords i just need help on codeing it.

item.title: How to make tele 317
item.dc:creator: @mmaKush mmaKush
item.description:
@mmaKush wrote:

Something like…

case OBJECTID:
     teleportToX = X COORDS;
     teleportToY = Y COORDS;
     heightLevel = 1;
break;

or, if you’re space savy like me and like to save space in the long run…
(Note: code and file names may vary depending on your source).

in your client class, add:

public void stairsTele(int X, int Y, int height) {
     teleportToX = X;
     teleportToY = Y;
     heightLevel = height;
}

this code is for if you add your teleports in your client class:

case OBJECTID:
     stairsTele(XCOORD, YCOORD, HEIGHT);
break;

this code is for if you add your teleports in it’s own class file:

case OBJECTID:
     c.stairsTele(XCOORD, YCOORD, HEIGHT);
break;

What this doesn’t contain:
This doesn’t contain the teleport animation or teleport gfx, teleport timer, & runes required.

Read full topic
